node.display_long_description:
Throw on some music and smash some drives in this massive update! We added a one of a kind Topgolf venue that can only be experienced in VR. Not sure what to do tonight? Topgolf in VR is open for business where you and 7 of your friends can hang out for hours.

If you’d prefer to get some sun, jump into Pro Putt with our four gorgeous putting courses.


- Full swing Topgolf range with your favorite Topgolf games
- Realistic physics model
- Multiplayer experiences that are as much about the golf as they are about hanging out with friends.
- YouTube web player
- Various Topgolf venue games
- Four beautiful courses to help you escape.
- Topgolf Putt Lounge 
- A 10,000 square foot practice green.
- Competition to match your skill level.
- Achievements and leaderboards for bragging rights!

Between the Topgolf venue and Pro Putt courses, we’ve got something for everyone. With our varying difficulties it’s simple enough for a novice, and hard enough for real pros.

latest_supported_binary.change_log:
- Web browser added to Topgolf Lounge media player.
- Full media player added to Pro Putt courses. (Quest 2 only)
- Social Panel to easily join friends in game and make new friends
- Misc bug fixes and UI updates.

node.internet_connection_name: 下载内容需要连接网络

node.reviewDescription:
Had this as a 4/5 before and a recommended buy though I felt from a mini golf standpoint, Walkabout Mini Golf was superior as I prefer Walkabout's more traditional and realistic style. I still do and I still think Walkabout is the superior overall game. However, this new Topgolf update that lets you take swings with full clubs is great, adds something very unique to the game, and pushes the game back up to 5/5 (score I had this at before Walkabout set a higher standard for me) and now makes this a game I'll go back to playing a lot more of. I look forward to when the other Topgolf mini games are added and I really dig the music/video feature that's been added in. The entire Topgolf mode implementation and lounge made me say "this is so cool" a couple times when I played it today. I find it to be that good. 

I hope that at least another new course is eventually added and it'd be so awesome if this ever gets ported to the PC and is cross-buy as I bet playing the topgolf mode with PC power would look great and be even more immersive. Even if it isn't cross-buy, I'd actually strongly consider the double-dip which is something I haven't done with any other VR/Quest game and generally refuse to do.

This was a game already worth owning before and this new update just made it a must-have in my mind for any person remotely interested in golf. Kudos to the devs for the job they've done with this new mode.
node.reviewTitle: Now that's what I'm talking about!
